articles.description: The two countries have achieved the target of 3.5 trillion Japanese Yen in public and private investments in India. According to Japanese media outlet Nikkei Asia, Kishida is likely to announce a plan to invest 5 trillion yen ($42 billion) in India over five …

articles.title: Timor-Leste's Ramos-Horta makes pitch for stability ahead of election - amp.rnz.co.nz
articles.description: The frontrunner in Timor-Leste's presidential election, independence figure and Nobel laureate Jose Ramos-Horta, has said he hopes to restore political stability to Asia's youngest democracy, as the nation prepares to head to the polls.

articles.title: 'Perfect Luke Skywalker': Star Wars actor Mark Hamill approves of child actor playing iconic character - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The child actor, Grant Feely, plays a young Luke Skywalker in the upcoming Disney+ series, Obi-Wan Kenobi, which stars Ewan McGregor and Hayden Christensen.
articles.content:
In the teaser trailer, we see the young Luke play pretending to drive a vehicle perhaps a landspeeder as Obi-Wan (played by Ewan McGregor) watches him from afar.
